overview:
Itai Kathein co-founded Snackable Media in 1999 and has served as its President since the companyâ€™s inception. Itai has been setting the vision of the company, while working with cross functional teams towards driving its growth and positioning the company as a market leader in the digital content space across online and mobile channels.

Itaiâ€™s keen ability to design and apply efficient systems and processes to innovative product and marketing programs has been instrumental in scaling the companyâ€™s success.

Itai received a BA in Finance and International Business as well as a BS in Computer Information Systems from Florida Atlantic University. He resides in Fort Lauderdale, FL with his wife and two children.

Itai snacks on Guess SMS and white chocolate.
